messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
Heya, Trainer!
Are you being good to Mother Nature?
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Good. You seem to be a kindhearted
Trainer.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
Listen, people and Pokémon, we’re all a
part of Mother Nature.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Heya, long time!Are you enjoying your nature-filled
adventure with Pokémon?
